overview: Panacea is a sequel to Public Access to the Cosmos. We continue the story of Chuck and his best friend, eleven year old Charlie Mullinex as they tumble down the rabbit hole of the LogosVerse in this dark mythology. When Chuck spends a year communing with negative entities named The Party Club he moves from being a magical adept to an evil sorcerer, but when the young girl Charlie comes back into his life he realizes he has made a mistake. While Chuck and Charlie try to save Charlies cousin Jaime from these negative entities the Logos and their allies work to switch off the psychic oscillator that has caused all the trouble.
title: Panacea
